group_1.narration: "It’s Karin and Kanagi…@Are you also taking a break?"
"No, the artist wished to visit your store…@So I decided to stop by and say hello with her."
"I’m needed back at the cafe.@I’m sorry to ask this, but may I leave@Artist Karin in your hands, Makino?"

group_1.textLeft: (She’s a maid too…)

group_1.narration: "Of course! Leave it to little ol’ me!"
"You sound like you’re dropping me off at daycare…"
"I’m sorry, I didn’t mean it like that.@I’ll see you later, Artist."
"Yep! I’ll be waiting for you!@Make sure to work hard, Nagitan!"
"M’kay, Karin! Let’s hang out lots@until Kanagi comes back!"

group_1.textRight: …uh, who’s that over there?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I’m…Kuroe.

group_1.textRight: I'm Karin Misono! Nice to meet you!

group_1.textLeft: ｜Kuroe is a Magical Girl from Takarazaki City.｜
｜She’s looking for a fun summer vacation.｜

group_1.textRight: I don’t meet many Magical Girls from other cities.@This is pretty new for me!

group_1.textLeft: Are you also a Magical Girl?

group_1.textRight: Yes! I’m the Magical Girl born of Halloween!

group_1.textLeft: I…see?

group_1.textRight: Are you really looking for a fun summer vacation, Kuroe?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Well then, let me tell you something good!
It’s the story of "Phantom Thief Magical Kirin".@Yep!
It’s from her special summer release issue!
Oh, you see, "Phantom Thief Magical Kirin" is…
A shoujo manga I’ve loved for a very long time!
So if Kuroe reads Magical Kirin, too…
I’m sure you’ll understand what a fun@summer vacation is!

group_1.textLeft: I see.
That was quite the sales pitch!
I suppose you’d have to read the whole book@to find the answer though…

group_1.textRight: Wouldn’t you have to spend your whole@vacation reading just to finish it?
Oh, that would be a problem…

group_1.textLeft: ｜I have read some of those volumes in e-book@format since Nemu had them.｜
｜Would it really take that long?｜

group_1.textRight: You’re a little different from everyone else,@Sakurako…
It’s true… The Magical Kirin books@are super long.
But that’s part of what makes them so great!
And sure, e-books are pretty convenient…
But there’s a certain magic to physical copies.

group_1.textLeft: (...I can relate to that sentiment, a little bit.)

group_1.textRight: Magical Kirin is like my holy bible!
I brought the newest issue with me today.
Let’s read it together!

group_1.textLeft: (It’s amazing how passionate she is about this…)
(You know…after all this talk, I might be a little interested.)

group_1.textRight: Ahh, this scene just captures the essence@of summer!
The clouds in this image are so powerful@because of all the different colors used!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, it’s a depiction of cloud iridescence.
You know, this composition could be used in photography too!

group_1.textRight: Imagine a picture of me with those clouds@in the background.
The image would just sizzle off the page,@don’t you think?

group_1.textLeft: Let’s try it sometime.

group_1.textRight: [chara:305350:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yes!!

group_1.textLeft: How about Kuroe…@I bet she’d look good holding some sparklers.

group_1.textRight: Oh, definitely! Wouldn’t she capture that@beautiful, fragile look?
Like a dark, mysterious figure who joins@the heroes halfway through!
A lowkey, mature kind of cool girl!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! Yeah!
…Something like that would be so embarrassing…

group_1.textRight: This is a great summer composition too!
Hm? Which one?

group_1.textLeft: (I wonder if photography is her passion…)
(It’s summer and all their hobbies are different,@yet they still find common ground.)
(It’s kind of strange, but also kind of fun.)
